mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (select MAX(h.zrecognizetime) zrecognizetime ,h.grade_name,h.zid,h.zname,h.ztrainingroomID,h.originalPictureUrl from (select m.zrecognizetime,m.zid,m.zname,m.grade_name,n.ztrainingroomID,m.originalPictureUrl from (select c.zrecognizetime,d.zid,d.zname,f.zname grade_name,c.originalPictureUrl,c.zscheduleID from zstudent_login c ,zstudent d,zgrade f where d.zgradeID=f.zid and d.zid=c.zstudentID and c.zcheck=#{zcheck} and c.zrecognizetime BETWEEN #{timestamp} and NOW())m LEFT OUTER JOIN zschedule n on m.zscheduleID=n.zid)h GROUP BY h.zid,h.ztrainingroomID) j where j.ztrainingroomID=#{ztrainingroomID} ORDER BY j.zrecognizetime ASC

SELECT * FROM (select MAX(h.zrecognizetime) zrecognizetime ,h.grade_name,h.zid,h.zname,h.ztrainingroomID,h.originalPictureUrl from (select m.zrecognizetime,m.zid,m.zname,m.grade_name,n.ztrainingroomID,m.originalPictureUrl from (select c.zrecognizetime,d.zid,d.zname,f.zname grade_name,c.originalPictureUrl,c.zscheduleID from zstudent_login c ,zstudent d,zgrade f where d.zgradeID=f.zid and d.zid=c.zstudentID and c.zcheck=#{zcheck} and c.zrecognizetime BETWEEN #{timestamp} and NOW())m LEFT OUTER JOIN zschedule n on m.zscheduleID=n.zid)h GROUP BY h.zid,h.ztrainingroomID) j ORDER BY j.zrecognizetime desc

select * from (select a.zteacherID,b.zname as zName,b.zidentity as zgradeName,a.zrecognizetime,a.originalPictureUrl from zteacher_login a, zteacher b where a.zteacherID=b.zid and a.zrecognizeIP =#{camerasIP} and a.zcheck=#{zcheck} and a.zrecognizetime between #{timestamp} and NOW())m GROUP BY m.zgradeName
